title: ZOE PLAYERS/MAINS - this frustrate u too?
body:
Land a bubble, but somebody auto's them?  {{champion:142}} "am i a joke to you?"...


I'm genuinely frustrated with this, i'm tired of explaining why u should let zoe land "Q" 1st on a sleeping target in every single one of my GOD DAMN GAMES!

ok... fair enough, y not politely explain as a tip before game... 
...20 minutes later !!!FLASH AUTO A SLEEPING FED KATARINA BABY!!! ~ some greedy team mate
"PENTAKILL"

i'm done.... idk what else to do... quit?
